casebody.head_matter:
Chase, Appellant, v. AMF Western Tool, Inc.
Argued January 10, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Ea-gen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

June 28, 1972:
